name: C'mon Anteater Use Fireball
description:
Oh No! Blue wants Anteater to use fireball however Anteater doesn't know how! Will Anteater be able to craft a fireball with his surrounding or will Blue lose his life savings?

Mouse 1 - Select item, Interact

Mouse 2 - Skip text

Use the hand icon in the corner to deselect items

Interact with an item while holding another item to combine the two items
